Articles.Content:
Hi!

I have the current contracts "Test TT-70 Radial Decoupler landed at Kerbin" and "Test TR-18A Stack Decoupler orbiting Kerbin" and both dont seem to be responsive to whenever I decouple them. I made very sure all the objectives are ticket green before trying, and also did them several times. Is there something special that I have missed in order to get the contract to complete, or (my guess) is it an early bug in the new patch?

Thank you for any responses!

Make sure you are activating them using by staging. If you Right Click--Decouple, it will not count for contract completion.

Cheers,

-Claw

Yes that is probably it. Thank you very much and sorry for my ignorance!

Best regards

I found that when you first go to launch it doesn't register you as landed...... if you go to space center then return back it registers you as landed then you can do the test.

EITHER

A. they actually want you to fly then land then test

OR

B. it's a bug.

Yes that is probably it. Thank you very much and sorry for my ignorance!

Best regards

No reason to be sorry. Hopefully that'll solve your problem.

I found that when you first go to launch it doesn't register you as landed...... if you go to space center then return back it registers you as landed then you can do the test.

Hmm. It used to register as landed on initial launch (to the pad or runway). Unless they changed it for 0.90.
